activities.name: Trux Midwest ID Watermark Lookup
activities.description: look up schema, database and table names from sqlsever and snowflake

activities.name: Incremental Loop Over ID Watermark Tables
activities.description: Activity to loop over tables that have primary keys with incremental IDs. This loops looks at our Watermark table in Snowflake and appends any IDs found in SQL server that are greater than the latest watermark in Snowflake.

activities.name: Incremental Loop Over Date Watermark Tables
RM05 Incremental Delta Load to Staging
activities.description: Copying delta rows from sql server to the staging tables created for each instance in snowflake (these tables will be dropped after all activities are completed)

activities.name: RM05 Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

dependsOn.activity: RM05 Incremental Delta Load to Staging

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05 t 
using ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05_STAGING s 
on concat(t.rm05_rout, t.rm05_seq1,t.rm05_seq2,t.rm05_date) = concat(s.rm05_rout, s.rm05_seq1,s.rm05_seq2,s.rm05_date) 
when matched then update set 
    t.rm05_date = s.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout = s.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1 = s.rm05_seq1, 
	t.rm05_seq2 = s.rm05_seq2, 
	t.rm05_truk = s.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv = s.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help = s.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel = s.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom = s.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1 = s.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2 = s.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1 = s.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2 = s.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom = s.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note = s.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour = s.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour = s.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil = s.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom = s.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime = s.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime = s.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime= s.rm05_starttime 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1,
	t.rm05_seq2,
	t.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime 
	)
values 
	(
	s.rm05_date,
	s.rm05_rout,
	s.rm05_seq1, 
	s.rm05_seq2, 
	s.rm05_truk,
	s.rm05_driv,
	s.rm05_help,
	s.rm05_fuel,
	s.rm05_fuom,
	s.rm05_tim1,
	s.rm05_tim2,
	s.rm05_odm1,
	s.rm05_odm2,
	s.rm05_ouom,
	s.rm05_note,
	s.rm05_starthour,
	s.rm05_endhour,
	s.rm05_oil,
	s.rm05_oil_uom,
	s.rm05_deptime,
	s.rm05_rettime,
	s.rm05_starttime)'
	)}

activities.name: SM01 Snowflake Merge Operation_copy1
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

dependsOn.activity: SM01 Incremental Delta Load to Staging

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().snowflake_schema,'.','SM01 t 
using ', 
    item().snowflake_schema,'.','sm01_staging s 
on concat(t.sm01_rout, t.sm01_sequ, t.sm01_date) = concat(s.sm01_rout, s.sm01_sequ, s.sm01_date) 
when matched then update set 
	t.sm01_date= s.sm01_date ,
	t.sm01_rout= s.sm01_rout ,
	t.sm01_sequ= s.sm01_sequ ,
	t.sm01_cust= s.sm01_cust ,
	t.sm01_site= s.sm01_site ,
	t.sm01_serv= s.sm01_serv ,
	t.sm01_qty= s.sm01_qty ,
	t.sm01_actv= s.sm01_actv ,
	t.sm01_amnt= s.sm01_amnt ,
	t.sm01_idte= s.sm01_idte ,
	t.sm01_refn= s.sm01_refn ,
	t.sm01_time= s.sm01_time ,
	t.sm01_wonu = s.sm01_wonu,
	t.sm01_data= s.sm01_data ,
	t.sm01_logid = s.sm01_logid,
	t.sm01_arateid = s.sm01_arateid,
	t.sm01_callid = s.sm01_callid,
	t.sm01_user= s.sm01_user ,
	t.sm01_cdte= s.sm01_cdte ,
	t.sm01_tim2= s.sm01_tim2 ,
	t.sm01_callnumber= s.sm01_callnumber ,
	t.sm01_storig = s.sm01_storig,
	t.sm01_stprev =s.sm01_stprev,
	t.sm01_stnext = s.sm01_stnext ,
	t.sm01_pchg= s.sm01_pchg ,
	t.sm01_orig_sequ = s.sm01_orig_sequ 

when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.sm01_date ,
	t.sm01_rout ,
	t.sm01_sequ ,
	t.sm01_cust ,
	t.sm01_site ,
	t.sm01_serv ,
	t.sm01_qty ,
	t.sm01_actv ,
	t.sm01_amnt ,
	t.sm01_idte ,
	t.sm01_refn ,
	t.sm01_time ,
	t.sm01_wonu,
	t.sm01_data ,
	t.sm01_logid ,
	t.sm01_arateid ,
	t.sm01_callid ,
	t.sm01_user ,
	t.sm01_cdte ,
	t.sm01_tim2 ,
	t.sm01_callnumber ,
	t.sm01_storig, 
	t.sm01_stprev ,
	t.sm01_stnext ,
	t.sm01_pchg ,
	t.sm01_orig_sequ 
	)
values 
	(
	s.sm01_date ,
	s.sm01_rout ,
	s.sm01_sequ ,
	s.sm01_cust ,
	s.sm01_site ,
	s.sm01_serv ,
	s.sm01_qty ,
	s.sm01_actv ,
	s.sm01_amnt ,
	s.sm01_idte ,
	s.sm01_refn ,
	s.sm01_time ,
	s.sm01_wonu, 
	s.sm01_data ,
	s.sm01_logid ,
	s.sm01_arateid ,
	s.sm01_callid ,
	s.sm01_user ,
	s.sm01_cdte ,
	s.sm01_tim2 ,
	s.sm01_callnumber ,
	s.sm01_storig ,
	s.sm01_stprev, 
	s.sm01_stnext ,
	s.sm01_pchg ,
	s.sm01_orig_sequ)'
	)}

activities.name: MT02 Snowflake Merge Operation_copy1_copy1
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

dependsOn.activity: MT02 Incremental Delta Load to Staging

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().snowflake_schema,'.','mt02 t 
using ', 
    item().snowflake_schema,'.','mt02_staging s 
on concat(t.mt02_refr, t.mt02_lmdate) = concat(s.mt02_refr, s.mt02_lmdate) 
when matched then update set 
	t.mt02_refr= s.mt02_refr ,
	t.mt02_cust= s.mt02_cust ,
	t.mt02_site= s.mt02_site ,
	t.mt02_serv= s.mt02_serv ,
	t.mt02_date =s.mt02_date ,
	t.mt02_code= s.mt02_code ,
	t.mt02_amnt= s.mt02_amnt ,
	t.mt02_desc= s.mt02_desc ,
	t.mt02_qty= s.mt02_qty ,
	t.mt02_idte= s.mt02_idte ,
	t.mt02_rout= s.mt02_rout ,
	t.mt02_sequ= s.mt02_sequ ,
	t.mt02_rate= s.mt02_rate ,
	t.mt02_lmuser= s.mt02_lmuser ,
	t.mt02_lmdate= s.mt02_lmdate ,
	t.mt02_desc0= s.mt02_desc0 ,
	t.mt02_desc1= s.mt02_desc1 ,
	t.mt02_desc2= s.mt02_desc2 ,
	t.mt02_desc3= s.mt02_desc3 ,
	t.mt02_lf05id= s.mt02_lf05id ,
	t.mt02_own= s.mt02_own ,
	t.mt02_schid= s.mt02_schid,
	t.mt02_schidw= s.mt02_schidw ,
	t.mt02_fcty= s.mt02_fcty 

when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.mt02_refr ,
	t.mt02_cust ,
	t.mt02_site ,
	t.mt02_serv ,
	t.mt02_date ,
	t.mt02_code ,
	t.mt02_amnt ,
	t.mt02_desc ,
	t.mt02_qty ,
	t.mt02_idte ,
	t.mt02_rout ,
	t.mt02_sequ ,
	t.mt02_rate ,
	t.mt02_lmuser ,
	t.mt02_lmdate ,
	t.mt02_desc0 ,
	t.mt02_desc1 ,
	t.mt02_desc2 ,
	t.mt02_desc3 ,
	t.mt02_lf05id ,
	t.mt02_own ,
	t.mt02_schid ,
	t.mt02_schidw ,
	t.mt02_fcty 
	)
values 
	(
s.mt02_refr ,
	s.mt02_cust ,
	s.mt02_site ,
	s.mt02_serv ,
	s.mt02_date ,
	s.mt02_code ,
	s.mt02_amnt ,
	s.mt02_desc ,
	s.mt02_qty ,
	s.mt02_idte ,
	s.mt02_rout ,
	s.mt02_sequ ,
	s.mt02_rate ,
	s.mt02_lmuser ,
	s.mt02_lmdate ,
	s.mt02_desc0 ,
	s.mt02_desc1 ,
	s.mt02_desc2 ,
	s.mt02_desc3 ,
	s.mt02_lf05id ,
	s.mt02_own ,
	s.mt02_schid ,
	s.mt02_schidw ,
	s.mt02_fcty )'
	)}

activities.name: SM01 Incremental Delta Load to Staging
activities.description: Copying delta rows from sql server to the staging tables created for each instance in snowflake (these tables will be dropped after all activities are completed)

activities.name: MT02 Incremental Delta Load to Staging
activities.description: Copying delta rows from sql server to the staging tables created for each instance in snowflake (these tables will be dropped after all activities are completed)

text.value:
@{concat(
    'Create or replace table ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.RM05_STAGING',
    ' as select * from ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.RM05 where 1=0'
    )
    }

@{concat(
    'Create or replace table ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.SM01_STAGING',
    ' as select * from ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.SM01 where 1=0'
    )
}

@{concat(
    'Create or replace table ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.MT02_STAGING',
    ' as select * from ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,
    '.MT02 where 1=0'
    )
}
